text: Liberec (, ) is the fifth-largest city in the Czech Republic. It is on the Lusatian Neisse and surrounded by the Jizera Mountains and Ještěd-Kozákov Ridge. It has a population of 100 000. It was first mentioned in 1352. ==Twin towns – Sister cities== Liberec is twinned with: * Amersfoort, Netherlands * Amiens, France * Augsburg, Germany * Nahariya, Israel * St. Gallen, Switzerland * Zittau, Germany * Dunkirk (Dunkerque), France * Kovrov, Russia ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Liberec Region
title: Liberec
